EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Cloud-Native Forum_Milan_Q118.Confirmation Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Conferma della sua registrazione
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the [EVENT NAME] Event.
Date: DAY-EMEA, Month DAY-NA, 2017 {{my.SAMPLE Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Time: X:xxAM to Y:yyPM
Location: Venue Name Venue Address City, State, ZIP (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ponce+City+Market,+675+Ponce+De+Leon+Ave+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f50410912c7be9:0x275114353ab5ce34?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjihMixwoPSAhWowlQKHY0MCAMQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email CONTACT at contact@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>. - be sure to update this hyperlink
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[]]>
